title: Wicked Queen
description: The final chapter of the Blackmoor Heir series.They tried to make me their slave. But I’m going to turn myself into their queen.Blackmoor has tried to take everything from me.My home. My family. My dignity. Even my life.But instead, I’ve found myself. I’ve found love, even if it’s not what the storybooks say it should be. I’ve found purpose, even if it’s revenge. I’ve found three men who might not die for me, but they’ll sure as hell kill for me.I was given to them as a pet. A trophy. A slave . A meaningless prize to bolster their claim to a town steeped in blood, sacrifice, and murder.I became their goddess instead. Dean, Cayde, and Jaxon? They go on their knees for me now. I might belong to them, but they’re mine too. My cruel, savage, merciless boys.Samhain is just around the corner, and the ritual is about to begin. But it won’t be me on the altar this time. And when it’s all over? It won’t be my blood that spills.My name is Athena Saint. And I’m about to show you all just how wicked I can be.
author: Ivy Thorn
